    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Creates an instance of the StartUp-Dialog and sets its visibility to true.
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments

      • startStreetLife

        public static void startStreetLife()
        starts the StreetLife-Simulation with default parameters. Useful for debug.

      • startStreetLife

        public static void startStreetLife​(int number_of_lanes,
                                   int size_of_street,
                                   int sim_speed,
                                   boolean default_cars)
        actually starts the StreetLife-Simulation with parameters
        Parameters:
        number_of_lanes - the amount of lanes the street should use
        size_of_street - the length of the street, equal to the size of the window
        sim_speed - the speed the simulation should run
        default_cars - true if default cars should be added
